attributes.action: Put a cap and lower insurance prices for young drivers
attributes.additional_details: Young drivers are being exploited by these insurance companies and are being charged too much and the fact is a lot of them cannot even afford to insure there cars.In an economy like this it is already hard for young drivers to get a license and lessons are very expensive and test are very hard to get and even if they manage to attain a license insurance prices are too high for an average British driver to comfortably pay it need to be looked and a cap is needed.
attributes.background: Stop allowing  insurance companies to charge insane prices for young drivers and put a cap on the most they can charge a person as some people get quoted over £10,000 a year for a normal car

rejection.details:
The Government isn't directly responsible for the price of car insurance, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Stop car insurers considering age of driver when setting insurance policies: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/653927

Establish a Commission to investigate extortionate Car Insurance price rises: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/644067
